name: Regular Fit
description:
This is a men's Regular Fit button-up shirt made by Arrow in a size 16-16.5 34/35. 
 The shirt is white and gray in a plaid pattern and features an Arrowflex collar, a full button-up front closure, long sleeves with button-up sleeve cuffs, a front pocket, and a round bottom hemline.
 It measures approximately 24.5 from underarm to underarm, 25 from top of shoulder to sleeve opening, and 32 from back of neck to bottom hemline when laid flat.
 This top was made in Bangladesh and is made of a 67/29/4 cotton/polyester/elastane blend.
 The garment comes in good pre-owned condition.
